headline.main: 'Motherhood Penalty, Daddy Bonus': New British Parents Judged at Work
headline.print_headline: 'Motherhood Penalty, Daddy Bonus': New British Parents Judged at Work

docs.snippet: If you're a new mother in Britain returning to work after having a baby here's some news for you: almost half your colleagues will think that you've become less committed to your job, according to a survey published on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: If you're a new mother in Britain returning to work after having a baby here's some news for you: almost half your colleagues will think that you've become less committed to your job, according to a survey published on Tuesday.

headline.main: Trout Homers and Steals, but White Sox Beat Angels 9-4
headline.print_headline: Trout Homers and Steals, but White Sox Beat Angels 9-4

docs.snippet: Mike Trout had his first homer and first stolen base of the spring in the Chicago White Sox's 9-4 victory over a Los Angeles Angels split squad on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mike Trout had his first homer and first stolen base of the spring in the Chicago White Sox's 9-4 victory over a Los Angeles Angels split squad on Monday.

headline.main: Polish PM Says EU-Turkey Migration Deal Big Step to Solve Crisis
headline.print_headline: Polish PM Says EU-Turkey Migration Deal Big Step to Solve Crisis

docs.snippet: Polish Prime Minister Beata Szydlo said on Tuesday that a Tuesday agreement between the European Union and Turkey - if fully implemented - would constitute a big step towards resolving Europe's migration crisis....
docs.lead_paragraph: Polish Prime Minister Beata Szydlo said on Tuesday that a Tuesday agreement between the European Union and Turkey - if fully implemented - would constitute a big step towards resolving Europe's migration crisis.

headline.main: Merkel Sees Potential Breakthrough in Turkey Offer to EU
headline.print_headline: Merkel Sees Potential Breakthrough in Turkey Offer to EU

docs.snippet: A Turkish offer to take back all illegal migrants who leave its shores for Europe is a potential breakthrough toward resolving the EU's migration crisis, German Chancellor Angela Merkel said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Turkish offer to take back all illegal migrants who leave its shores for Europe is a potential breakthrough toward resolving the EU's migration crisis, German Chancellor Angela Merkel said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Mosquitoes, Not Security, Viewed as Big Rio Threat
headline.print_headline: Mosquitoes, Not Security, Viewed as Big Rio Threat

docs.snippet: Zika, doping and venue problems dominated the opening day of the U.S. Olympic Committee's media summit on Monday as officials were pushed on athlete health and safety for this year's Rio Olympics....
docs.lead_paragraph: Zika, doping and venue problems dominated the opening day of the U.S. Olympic Committee's media summit on Monday as officials were pushed on athlete health and safety for this year's Rio Olympics.

headline.main: China's ZTE Says Working to Resolve Issue Over U.S. Export Restrictions
headline.print_headline: China's ZTE Says Working to Resolve Issue Over U.S. Export Restrictions

docs.snippet: China's ZTE Corp said on Tuesday it is working with U.S. agencies to resolve an issue over export restrictions placed by the U.S. Commerce Department on the Chinese telecommunications equipment maker....
docs.lead_paragraph: China's ZTE Corp said on Tuesday it is working with U.S. agencies to resolve an issue over export restrictions placed by the U.S. Commerce Department on the Chinese telecommunications equipment maker.

docs.snippet: In a story March 7 about the band AC/DC postponing 10 dates of their tour, The Associated Press erroneously reported that the rescheduled dates would begin Thursday. The rescheduled dates began Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story March 7 about the band AC/DC postponing 10 dates of their tour, The Associated Press erroneously reported that the rescheduled dates would begin Thursday. The rescheduled dates began Tuesday.

headline.main: Things to Know About Meldonium After Sharapova Fails Test
headline.print_headline: Things to Know About Meldonium After Sharapova Fails Test

docs.snippet: Russian tennis star Maria Sharapova says she failed a drug test for meldonium at the Australian Open. The drug was only banned in January and there has been a string of failed tests by athletes in several sports since....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russian tennis star Maria Sharapova says she failed a drug test for meldonium at the Australian Open. The drug was only banned in January and there has been a string of failed tests by athletes in several sports since.

headline.main: EU, Turkish Leaders Agree Western Balkans Route 'Has Come to an End'-Official
headline.print_headline: EU, Turkish Leaders Agree Western Balkans Route 'Has Come to an End'-Official

docs.snippet: European and Turkish leaders agreed at a summit on Tuesday that the migration route from Greece to western Europe through the Western Balkans "has come to an end", a European Union official said....
docs.lead_paragraph: European and Turkish leaders agreed at a summit on Tuesday that the migration route from Greece to western Europe through the Western Balkans "has come to an end", a European Union official said.

headline.main: UK Starting Salaries Rise Faster in February-REC
headline.print_headline: UK Starting Salaries Rise Faster in February-REC

docs.snippet: Starting salaries for newly recruited permanent staff in Britain rose in February at the fastest rate in three months, but pay growth for temporary workers was the weakest in nearly three years, a survey of recruiters showed on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Starting salaries for newly recruited permanent staff in Britain rose in February at the fastest rate in three months, but pay growth for temporary workers was the weakest in nearly three years, a survey of recruiters showed on Tuesday.
